data.title: Serving Illinois for 150 Years
data.meta_description: C.V. Lloyde Audiovisual has been serving Illinois for 150 years with professional quality digital signage and installation. Learn more now.
data.text:
Project Details

CVLAV was honored to be selected by Anthony James Partners and Michigan State University to assist in deploying and executing the installation of a new arena sound system at the Breslin Student Events Center, home to the Michigan State Spartans basketball.

Our Scope

MSU Breslin Center's new sound system consists of the following:

(8) Array Systems comprised of

(12) Fulcrum FL283T Dual 8″ Subcardioid Arrays

…

Project Details

The brand new Ed Robson Arena at Colorado College in Colorado Springs is a multi-purpose, state-of-the-art, sustainable sporting event venue that benefits both the college and the City of Colorado Springs. This is the first ever on-campus hockey facility for the Colorado College Tigers. The arena is one of four unique Colorado Springs venues designed to strengthen and diversify the economic impact of Pikes Peak region visitor attractions.

Our …

Project Details

The Carrier Dome, America's most famous and largest structure of its kind on a college campus, is a facility that generates media exposure and adds glamour that attracts some of the nation's most talented student-athletes to Syracuse University. The dome's 5 year, $118 million renovation was completed in Fall, 2020. Former greats that have graced the Dome hardwood include Dwayne "Pearl" Washington, Billy Owens, Rony Seikaly, Sherman Douglas, Derrick Coleman, John Wallace, …
